bug.short_desc: Selection reset when model is created by a form controller

long_desc.thetext:
From the ML:
When the createModel() method is called, it seems to reset the radiobutton elements, so the return values are always incorrect...
You can take a look at the following example: http://bit.ly/d7Hv5A
When we check 'Extended Theme' and then submit the form, 'Default Theme' is rechecked...
Additionally: Well, the same happens when you're using a SelectBox containing multiple ListItems with model. Maybe we're both wrong but I think it's a bug.
Please have a look here: http://bit.ly/b0Rquu.
